title: Person of Interest - 4x10 - Tricky Situation
author: YT.POI
comment: when I saw the meme, I assumed this was a comedy, then I saw this scene.

Very glad Person of Interest gets more exposure thanks to the meme.

Underrated TV-show.
The meme dragged me here. I wasn't aware that the actual scene is so serious. Goddamn.
when your heading to shoot at some guys a few metres away in a church don't forget to pack the 10x optic
